    StructureDefinition-extension-modality

    source file: source/pages/_includes/extension-modality-intro.md

    The modality whereby the measure is obtained. Choice of sensed self-reported .

    Context of Use: Observation.device

    Formal Views of Profile Content

    Description of Profiles, Differentials, and Snapshots.

    The official URL for this profile is: http://www.fhir.org/guides/omhtofhir/StructureDefinition/extension-modality

    Published on Thu Jun 06 00:00:00 PDT 2019 as active by the Open mHealth.

    This profile builds on Extension
